text: Jean Audrey Knight (née Caliste; January 26, 1943 – November 22, 2023) was an American R&B; and soul singer. She was born in New Orleans, Louisiana. Knight was best known for her 1971 hit single "Mr. Big Stuff". Knight died at a hospital in Tampa, Florida, on November 22, 2023, at the age of 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1943 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Singers from New Orleans Category:American R&B; singers Category:American soul singers Category:American funk singers
title: Jean Knight
